page.title: 02Colin Whitear's Day
page.content: "Wake up Colin," the voice of my stepfather is the first voice I hear of the day.I get up and after I am dressed I go downstairs for my breakfast.I normally have scrambled egg on toast.I usually leave at 8.30am for school after watching TVam for 10 minutes.on my way to school I see the same people everyday.I arrive in school at 8.45 and at about 9.00am the register is taken and we go into assembly.After that we have lessons until 10.40,then it is playtime.We play for 15 minutes then we have a 1 hours lesson.The bell rings at 12.00 for lunch.We are back in class at 1.15,at 3.15 I go home and watch television.At 5.30 I have dinner and I go to bed at 9.00.
